text: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
author: Walt Whitman

text: It's a funny thing about life if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

text: If you want to go somewhere, it is best to find someone who has already been there.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

text: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
author: Max Beerbohm
